MyList.title: Guide to Basics
paragraph: 1- Main Menu: The main menu allows you to select your game mode, customize your character, and access the options menu.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/PayDay3/main/1.1.png
2- Weapon Customization: You can customize your weapons by selecting them in the inventory menu and then choosing from a variety of modifications.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/PayDay3/main/1.2.png
3- Character Customization: You can customize your character's appearance and skills by selecting them in the inventory menu and then choosing from a variety of options.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/PayDay3/main/1.3.png

MyList.title: Walkthroughs
paragraph: 1- No Room for the Wicked: This is a stealth mission in which you must enter a bank and steal a valuable item. The following steps can help you complete the mission.

2- Enter the bank. 
  - Disable the cameras.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/PayDay3/main/2.1.png

3- Find the security room and hack the computer. 
  - Disable the alarms.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/PayDay3/main/2.2.png

4- Find the vault and drill it open. 
  - Retrieve the item and escape.

MyList.title: Progression
paragraph: 1- Character Progression: Character progression has changed in Payday 3.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/PayDay3/main/3.1.png
2- You can now earn experience points by completing missions and use them to unlock new skills and abilities
3- The initial 8 heists will all be located in New York, with two of them being located in a Downtown NYC bank
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/PayDay3/main/3.2.png
4- It is important to note that the information available on the specific heists that will be included in Payday 3 is limited at this time.
